data.name: Island games
data.detailed_description:
Island games - You life.
Play different game modes in one game. Communicate with players and fight with them.
You have to get to the end of the map.

About game modes: Runner and box and bunny hop.
You play as a running man who passes a time trial.
Do you think it's easy ?! But we will say that it is not quite easy. On the way there will be obstacles in the form of boxes that can have both a positive effect and a negative one.
The faster you get there, the better. And compete with the players and find out who will be faster and smarter.

About game mode: Adrenaline battle (PvP).
Fight against players and bots. Show your weapon skill. Show who is the master of his weapons.

About game modes on dev: Lobby, wall runner, golf, King of the lava mountain, Run hamster ball.
Lobby complete 30% (You can meeting other players and chatting. NPC not saled items and not working arcade zone)
Wallrun - Needed maps
Golf complete 20% (Need map and recounstruct Gamemode physics)
King of the lava mountain and Run hamster ball - (Active work on true gameplay planning).

data.short_description: Island games - You life. The game includes several game modes that are suitable for competition with other people or bots. You can also relax and communicate with other players on the island.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Dual core, or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX, AMD Radeon 6870 HD, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
